name: Battlefield 1942
notes: My Abandonware no longer provides Battlefield 1942. Please download a zipped archive before using this installer.
content:
files:
- archive: N/A:Please select unzipped game archive
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/EA Games/Battlefield 1942/BF1942.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    description: Extracting archive
    dst: $CACHE/BF1942/
    file: $archive
- task:
    args: /silent
    description: Installing Battlefield 1942
    executable: $CACHE/BF1942/Battlefield 1942/bf1942-setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
